trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around August 7th 2009
Summary: Incandescent--almost like a fireball--sphere flying north direction above West Harlem
divs: sighting detailsi have a 180 degrees panoramic view of west harlem in manhattan from where i live. around 11:30pm on august 7th, 2009, i decided to get up from my desk and take a break. the moment i approached my living room window to look to the horizon, i see this greenish\whiteish incandescent fireball flying horizontally above my building in direction north to west harlem above morningside heights. however after two seconds the fireball suddenly--and instantaneously--disappeared without trace. the speed at which it was flying was similar to the speed of a helicopter in cruising mode.
